attributes.action: Stop people who live within 5 miles of a race track to complain about the noise coming from it.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Trackdays,Motorsport for both Bikes and Cars should be allowed to continue at all the Uk's race circuits without fear of some small minded local complaining about the noise coming from the circuit. 
It is a fact of life that if you buy a house near a track there will be noise and that it that. In this day and age Motorsport employs 1000's of people in the uk and we need to keep the jobs it creates, be it a guy who sell's burgers at race meetings to the chap who owns a race team. After all a job is a job so please don't let people complain about the noise !
